name: dredd-secure
description: **dreddsecure** is a blockchain built using Cosmos SDK and Tendermint and created with [Ignite CLI](https://ignite.com/cli).

scripts.build: docker build -f Dockerfile . -t dredd-secure_i && docker create --name dredd-secure -i -v $(pwd):/dredd-secure -w /dredd-secure -p 1317:1317 -p 3000:3000 -p 4500:4500 -p 5000:5000 -p 26657:26657 dredd-secure_i
scripts.start: docker start dredd-secure && docker exec -it dredd-secure ignite chain serve
